001package Tools;
002
003import ij.IJ;
004import ij.ImagePlus;
005import ij.WindowManager;
006import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
007import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
008import imagingbook.lib.ij.GuiTools;
009
010/**
011 * Resizes the window of the given image to fit an arbitrary, user-specified
012 * magnification factor.
013 * The resulting window size is limited by the current screen size.
014 * The window size is reduced if too large but the given magnification factor
015 * remains always unchanged.
016 * 
017 * @version 2020/10/08
018 */
019public class Zoom_Exact implements PlugIn {
020        
021        private static boolean LOG_OUTPUT = false;
022        
023        public void run(String arg) {
024                ImagePlus im = WindowManager.getCurrentImage();
025                if (im == null) {
026                        IJ.showMessage("No image open");
027                        return;
028                }
029                
030                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog("Zoom Exact");
031                gd.addNumericField("Magnification (%): ", GuiTools.getMagnification(im) * 100, 0);
032                gd.addCheckbox("Log output", LOG_OUTPUT);
033                gd.showDialog();
034                if (gd.wasCanceled())
035                        return;
036                double mag = gd.getNextNumber() / 100.0;
037                LOG_OUTPUT = gd.getNextBoolean();
038                
039                if (mag < 0.001) {
040                        IJ.showMessage(String.format("Out of range magnification:\n%.3f", mag));
041                        return;
042                }
043                
044                if (GuiTools.zoomExact(im, mag)) {
045                        if (LOG_OUTPUT) {
046                                IJ.log(String.format("new magnification: %.3f",  GuiTools.getMagnification(im)));
047                        }
048                }
049                else {
050                        IJ.showMessage(Zoom_Exact.class.getSimpleName() + " failed");
051                }
052        }
053}
